welcomeFirst: This is a strategy type guessing game for two players. It is played on ruled grids on which each player's fleet of warships are marked.
welcomeSecond: The locations of the fleets are concealed from the other player. Players alternate turns calling "shots" at the other player's ships, and the objective of the game is to destroy the opposing player's fleet.
youCanPlay: You can play BattleShip with artificial intelligence, random player or your friend.
loginPlease: To play online with a random player, please login to your account. To play with a friend, enter his nickname.
descriptionFirst: BattleShip is played on two 10x10 square maps. On his map, the player arranges ships, on the other, shots at enemy ships are shown.
arrangeParagraph: Before the start of BattleShip, players place their ships in secret on the main map. Each ship occupies a series of consecutive squares either horizontally or vertically. Ships cannot cross each other.
Ship types paragraph: The military fleet of each player consists of 10 ships of various types. These are 1 battleship of 4 cells, 2 cruisers of 3 cells, 3 destroyers of 2 cells and 4 torpedo boats of 1 cell each.
shipAttack paragraph: After the ships are placed, the game continues for several rounds. Each player, in turn, selects one cell on the opponent's card and fires a shot.
game progress paragraph: When hitting an enemy ship, a cross is placed on a foreign field, and a dot is placed on a blank shot. The goal of the game is to find and destroy the entire enemy fleet.
battleWinnerFirst: Once all ships of one of the players are sunk, the game ends. The winner in a naval battle is the player who first manages to determine the location of all enemy ships.
dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your ships on the field or press the button for a random arrangement.
winDisconnect: Opponent has left the battle, you can wait, he may to return
winExit: The enemy has left the battle
winWin: You have sunk all enemy ships
winLose: Enemy has destroyed all your ships
